390800.name: Circa Infinity Demo
390800.description:
Circa Infinity is a brain-melting circular platformer by Kenny Sun, with a pulse-pounding soundtrack by Jack + Jim Fay. The demo includes the first 10 levels of the game.

Quotes


"MY BRAIN IS MELTING!"
- Pewdiepie

"I like the idea that games can sometimes be music videos, especially when they're as striking and well-soundtracked as Circa Infinity."
- Tom Senior, PC Gamer

"Its smelled my brain but i love it."
- Maurice, 19

"One of the craziest games I've ever played."
- Bhernardo Viana, Indie Game Magazine
390800.supported_languages:
英语*
*具有完全音频支持的语言
